DescriptionData.Title: Leg Avenue Striped Thigh Highs - White with Rainbow
DescriptionData.Description: These rainbow topped thigh high socks will help you kick some fun into your outfit! The socks are striped from top to toe and are sized to fit most adults. 80% Nylon 15% Polyester 5% Spandex to retain their shape. Hand wash, drip dry. Fit thighs 18 - 20 inches in circumference.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: White thigh highs with rainbow stripes at the top
80% Nylon 15% Polyester 5% Spandex to retain their shape
Fits approximately 24"-32" waist, 34"-40" hip, 35" inseam, up to 24" thigh and 16" calf and 90-160 lbs
